purpose: Installs general-purpose fonts for system-wide use in NixOS.
integration_points: Adds Liberation TTF to system fonts
notes: This NixOS module enables Ghostscript fonts and installs the Liberation font family, which provides free alternatives to common proprietary fonts like Arial and Times New Roman. The module is simple and focused on providing basic font coverage for documents, web browsing, and user interfaces. Reasoning: Ensures consistent font rendering across applications by installing a reliable, open-source font set. No options or complex logic; straightforward package addition.
